title: Crash whenever in-game client launches
body:
After the patch today, which from what i understand is the new anti-cheat, every time that the in-game client launches after champ select, the game crashes and every attempt of reconnect gives me the same issue.
This is the system error that's popping up after the crash : 
https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/175071354087931904/456913412081975307/unknown.png

replies.body:
I face the same issue, could you please look into the crash dump and help me resolve the problem.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/bs6t9042bgux2pu/PKMF274.tmp?dl=0

Regards,
~

Hey DarkKillerDK,

Thanks for providing the crash dump. You're awesome! We believe your issue is related to something from Zone Alarm called "Force Field". Could you please uninstall that software?
